structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Employment Distinction Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of employment distinction categories based on working time arrangements for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Full-time employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed on a full-time basis according to standard working hours.

structure:Code.common:Name: Part-time employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons employed on a part-time basis with reduced working hours.
